That's unfortunate. What do you mean 600+ GB of memory? Is this a typo? Do you mean on the CPU or GPU?

One thing to consider is how we should handle serialization. It's going to be tricky for the descriptor, because we can't serialize it. So if it's not too much of a performance penalty, it would be better to go with (2) until cudnn v7.
